snippet: The PGA Tour rookie Brian Harman thought he had missed his chance to get into the Players Championship field, but Tour officials gave him one after a late, tee box withdrawal by D.A. Points.
abstract: The PGA Tour rookie Brian Harman thought he had missed his chance to get into the Players Championship field, but Tour officials gave him one after a late, tee box withdrawal by D.A. Points.

headline.main: Tour Rookie Gets Unusual, and Delayed, Entry into Players Championship
